ebooks.author: George Orwell
ebooks.quote: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.

ebooks.title: The Alchemist
ebooks.author: Paulo Coelho
ebooks.quote: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.

ebooks.title: Fairy Tale
ebooks.author: Stephen King
ebooks.quote: There's a dark well in everyone, I think, and it never goes dry. But you drink from it at your peril. That water is poison

ebooks.title: The Metamorphosis
ebooks.author: Franz Kafka
ebooks.quote: I cannot make you understand. I cannot make anyone understand what is happening inside me. I cannot even explain it to myself.

ebooks.title: Atomic Habits
ebooks.author: James Clear
ebooks.quote: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.

ebooks.title: I Will Teach You to Be Rich
ebooks.author: Ramit Sethi
ebooks.quote: The most important thing is to start. Do not wait until you have everything figured out.
